content: Bedrich Benes at Purdue University Toggle navigation Bedrich Benes at Purdue University CV/Bio Publications Computational Vegetation Teaching Students Funding Bedrich Benes, Ph.D Professor and Associate Head of Computer Science at Purdue University. Address Lawson Building, Room 3181 305 N University St. West Lafayette, IN, 47907-2021 voice: (765)-496-2954 e-mail: bbenes@purdue.edu (since 2022) Editor in Chief Graphical Models (since 2022) Associate Editor Computer Graphics Forum Fellow of the Eurographics Association for Computer Graphics Senior Member of IEEE Senior Member of ACM Editor in Chief of Computer Graphics Forum (2018-2021) (2014-2024) Associate Editor of Computers & Graphics Associate Editor of IEEE Transactions on Games (2019-2022) Youtube News September 2025 New NSF grant received ($0.9M). April 2025 Bosheng Li and Xiaochen Zhou successfully defended their Ph.D. theses! April 2025 Our new neural ranking algorithm TreeStructor allows for a full forest reconstruction from point clouds. January 2025 Another news about out Tree D-Fusion project. at Purdue News, Eureka Alert , and TechXplore January 2025 Some news about out Tree D-Fusion project. at Planetizen, Woodcentral , and the Cooldown December 2024 Purdue News about our new grant November 2024 I preseted our work on tree digital twins and greening cities at the Symposium on Geometry and Computational Design (GCD) 2024 September 2024 News about our AI-driven VR conversational interfaces ($2M NSF grant) August 2024 Four grant proposals funded with over $5.2 ($4M as PI). ... see all News Â© 2024 Bedrich Benes.
